overview: Griffin Michael is the only survivor of a top-secret C.I.A. program that raised five people to become superweaponsâ€”human killing machines. Griffin has been trained to use his mind as a weapon: with a small brain impulse he can move objects hundreds of times his own weight, and can kill with a single thought. Now he is about to be released from the remote secret facility where he has been raised, and unleashed on an unsuspecting world...
tagline: The ultimate weapon is the human mind
title: Project: Human Weapon
